record.description: Ascension of Eagle Airship no. 2 in Hyde Park. A Mr. Hamilton or "Airshipman" as the newspapers of the day called him designed and flew this strange craft giving demonstrations of his skill and temerity at various places in and around Chicago.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: University of Chicago Archives stamp on a copy.Negative on file.
